RespTxt: Too much power is concentrated in the hands of a few large companies
QuestionTxt: Now I'm going to read you a few more pairs of statements. As I read each pair, tell me whether the first statement or the second statement comes closer to your own views--even if neither is exactly right....Too much power in concentrated in the hands of a few large companies, the largest companies do not have too much power.
SourceDoc: Public Affairs Council Public Affairs Pulse Survey
StudyNote: 803 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 801 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 395 who had no landline telephone
